amendment.description: To require a study and report on the changes to the Joint Travel Regulations related to the flat rate per diem for long term temporary duty travel that took effect on November 1, 2014.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1551 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1551 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3755-3756; text: CR S3755) To require a study and report on the changes to the Joint Travel Regulations related to the flat rate per diem for long term temporary duty travel that took effect on November 1, 2014.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1551 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1551 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1463.
